channel.title: How do I stop inventory flashing from Grand Exchange Sell Screen
channel.description:
Pretty much when I click the Back button from Sell Offer
I know how to add code to the Back button interface But I don't know how to stop the flashing of the inventory well.. it's not even the correct inventory it's the GE inventory, I'm guessing I have to revert somehow to real inventory.
but that will Grand Exchange with the flashing inventory.
[img]http://i.imgur.com/CpJ9Xcs.png[/img]
[b]Solved[/b]
Just add to Back Button [code] if (player.isHd()) player.getPackets().sendCloseInterface(746, 76); // Inventory else player.getPackets().sendCloseInterface(548, 80); // Inventory [/code]

item.title: How do I stop inventory flashing from Grand Exchange Sell Screen
item.dc:creator: @sspoke sspoke
item.description:
@sspoke wrote:

Pretty much when I click the Back button from Sell Offer

I know how to add code to the Back button interface
But I don’t know how to stop the flashing of the inventory well… it’s not even the correct inventory it’s the GE inventory, I’m guessing I have to revert somehow to real inventory.

but that will Grand Exchange with the flashing inventory.

Solved

Just add to Back Button

         if (player.isHd())
                player.getPackets().sendCloseInterface(746, 76); // Inventory
         else
                player.getPackets().sendCloseInterface(548, 80); // Inventory

Read full topic
item.source: How do I stop inventory flashing from Grand Exchange Sell Screen
